column1: 23967,Immortal Iron Fist (2006) #25,25,22307,108,"Danny and the Immortal Weapons suffer infernal torment as the rollicking ESCAPE FROM THE EIGHTH CITY arc continues! Fighting back to back with a mystical ally, Danny comes face to face with the diabolical leader of this warped dimension - Changming! But what is his deadly secret?! It's all-out kung fu/horror/mystery/super hero action in Hell from Duane Swierczynski and Travel Foreman!,2009,4
